  • Observation How many times in the past year have you used an illegal drug or used a prescription medication for non-medical reasons
  • Observation Little interest or pleasure in doing things in last 2 weeks
  • Observation Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless in last 2 weeks
  • Observation PROMIS-10 Global Mental Health (GMH) score T-score
  • Observation Stress level
  • Observation Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, do you have serious difficulty concentrating, remembering, or making decisions
  • Observation Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, do you have difficulty doing errands alone such as visiting a physician's office or shopping
